node.title: Node
node.description: Node is the environment in which controllers and components operate, which can be a host or a container. The platform leverages the controllers on the nodes to manage the nodes and uniformly regulate the operation of the components.

environment.title: Environment
environment.description: The cloud region environment communicates with the platform through Nats Executor and Stargazer components running on proxy hosts or K8s clusters.

variable.title: Variable
variable.description: Variables are used to dynamically replace values in configuration files, facilitating unified management and configuration reuse.

Configuration.modifydelinfo: Are you sure you want to delete this configuration?
Configuration.varconfig: These variables are available in the configuration
Configuration.deleteinfo: Are you sure you want to delete this configuration?
Configuration.deleteSubConfigWarning: Deleting a configuration is an unconventional operation that may cause component malfunctions. Please confirm that this action is necessary and be aware of the potential impacts.

node.sidecarVersionDes: Please select the Controller version for remote installation.
node.installingTips: Some nodes are still being installed. After returning, you can view the successfully installed nodes in the list.
node.downloadTips: 1. Select the appropriate version to download the controller installation package and configuration file template based on the node name and organization
node.telegrafConfigTips: When opening the Telegraf probe, it automatically initializes and binds the corresponding configuration file. If you need to modify it later, please go to the 'Configuration List' to make changes.
node.installWayDes: Remote installation requires providing host-related login information to perform remote installation of controllers, including sidecar and nas executor; for manual installation, follow the installation steps to manually operate and install the component on the host.
node.restartCollectorInfo: Are you sure to restart these components?
node.defaultUninstallNodeDes: Uninstalling the controller requires using the default node and selecting a node with normal NAS execotor status.
node.uninstallSidecarInfo: Are you sure you want to uninstall these controllers?
node.uninstallSidecarTips: Are you sure you want to uninstall these sidecars?
node.executorVersionDes: Please select the Nas Executor version for remote installation.
node.defaultNodeDes: Remote installation of components requires using the default node to push relevant installation packages. A node with normal nas executor status must be selected.
node.scriptTips: 2. Execute the following script to install the controller
node.finishTips: 3. After manual installation, the normal nodes of the controller can be viewed in the node list
node.deleteNodeTips: For nodes that are automatically installed, it is recommended to uninstall the controller for deletion. After manually deleting the node, if the node's side car reports normally in the future, it will be automatically updated in the list.
node.btntext1: If you do not have the configuration file you need, please click
node.desc: Node is the environment in which controllers and components operate, which can be a host or a container. The platform leverages the controllers on the nodes to manage the nodes and uniformly regulate the operation of the components.
node.bindaditinfo: After binding the configuration file, the corresponding collector will start automatically.
node.containerNodeTip: Container nodes are built-in nodes of the cloud region and do not support uninstallation and deletion
node.commandCopiedDesc: This command is specific to the current host. Please paste and execute it in the PowerShell (Administrator) window.
node.autoInstallDes: For manual installation, please follow the operation instructions on the host device.
node.confirmFinishContent2: are being installed. Ending the installation will stop all installation processes. Successfully installed nodes will not be affected.
node.retryInstallInfo: Please configure SSH connection information to reinstall
node.excelLoginPassword: Password (please import the key on the webpage)
node.linuxCommandCopiedDesc: This command is specific to the current host. Please paste and execute it on that host.

editform.title: Edit Cloud Region
editform.proxyIpOrDomainPlaceholder: Please enter the IP address or domain name of the proxy host, e.g., 192.168.1.100 or example.com
editform.proxyTips: The proxy host is a host in the cloud region that can communicate with the platform (default communication ports: 443, 4222). Please enter the IP or domain name of the proxy host in the cloud region network.

variable.deleteinfo: Are you sure to delete this variable?
variable.variableNameTips: Only A-Z, a-z, 0-9, and _ are allowed

environment.proxyIpPlaceholder: Please enter the IP address or domain name of the proxy host
environment.proxyTips: The proxy host is a host in the cloud region that can communicate with the platform (default communication ports: 443, 4222). Please enter the IP or domain name of the proxy host in the cloud region network.
environment.copySuccessDesc: Please go to the proxy host to execute the copied command. Refresh the proxy status after the command is executed successfully.
environment.editWarningContent: Modifying the cloud region proxy host information is an unconventional operation that may cause existing nodes to lose connection.
environment.editWarningTip: Please confirm that this operation is necessary and be aware of potential impacts.

deleteform.deleteInfo: Are you sure you want to delete this cloud area?
deleteform.title: Delete Cloud Region

deploy.upgradeTitle: Upgrade to Enterprise Edition for More Features
deploy.upgradeDescription: The community edition cloud region only supports container deployment, K8s deployment method please upgrade to enterprise edition.
deploy.usernamePlaceholder: Please enter login account, e.g.: root
deploy.title: Deploy Cloud Region
deploy.sshServiceTips: The cloud region needs to use SSH service during deployment, and can be closed after deployment is complete to improve security.
deploy.ipFormatError: Please enter a valid IP address format
deploy.containerTips: Please connect to the cloud region and select a host that can communicate directly with the platform master node to deploy Nats Executor and Stargazer container components, thereby acting as a bridge between the cloud region and the platform master node.

integrations.batchDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the selected items?
integrations.multipleSelectHint: Multiple values supported, separated by commas
integrations.batchEditEmptyWarning: The submitted form cannot be empty
integrations.invalidExcelFile: Excel file is empty or format is incorrect
integrations.excelImportTips: Only xlsx files can be uploaded, and no more than 20MB
integrations.clickOrDragFile: Click or drag file to this area to upload
integrations.onlyExcelAllowed: Only xlsx format files can be uploaded

packetManage.deleteInfo: Are you sure to delete this item?
packetManage.title: Overview
packetManage.desc: Introduce each collector, including basic information, usage scenarios, and collected data.

controller.installCompleteDesc: You have successfully completed the controller installation process!
controller.installCompleteSubDesc: You can view and manage the installed controllers in the node list.
